Literature.Title: Mirabamides A-D, depsipeptides from the sponge Siliquariaspongia mirabilis that inhibit HIV-1 fusion
Literature.Author: Plaza A, Gustchina E, Baker HL, Kelly M, Bewley CA

Sequence Information.Target Organism: HIV-1 HxB2(IC50 I=>50µM),HIV-1 PsV(IC50 I=>50µM),HIV-1(IC50 F=>10µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 15442(no activity data),Escherichia coli ATCC 8739(no activity data),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(no activity data)
